# KernelCommandLine

Additional kernel command line options to add to the image.

| Characteristic | Value    |
| -------------- | -------- |
| Type           | `object` |

## Properties

### `extraCommandLine` **<span>(required)</span>**

| Characteristic | Value   |
| -------------- | ------- |
| Type           | `array` |

- Items of the array must have the type:

   | Characteristic | Value    |
   | -------------- | -------- |
   | Type           | `string` |
